long_description: The Moji Back Pain Relief System provides moist heat or ice right where it's needed most, offering full coverage to your lower back. Support wrap articulates comfortably around your body, allowing you to move naturally while relieving pain. Polartec(R) performance stretch fabric supports your lower back and stays firmly in place while standing, sitting, or lying down. The Moji Back Pain Relief System relieves pain within seconds and can be worn discretely under your clothes.
short_description: The Moji Back Pain Relief System provides moist heat or ice right where it's needed most, offering full coverage to your lower back.
